com.dhemery.expressing

Class ForwardingExpressive

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.expressing.Evaluations
      • com.dhemery.expressing.Expressive
        • com.dhemery.expressing.ForwardingExpressive

  • public class ForwardingExpressive
extends Expressive
    An Expressive that forwards to another Expressive to create default tickers and prepare conditions for polling.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ForwardingExpressive(Expressive source)
      Create an Expressive that forwards to the source Expressive to create default tickers and prepare conditions for polling.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • createDefaultTicker

        public Ticker createDefaultTicker()
        Description copied from class: Expressive
        Create a new default ticker. This method is called by the Expressive.eventually() method to obtain a default ticker for polling. The eventually() method is called in two circumstances:
        • When the expression explicitly calls it.
        • When a polling expression does not include a ticker.

        Subclasses must implement this method.

        IMPORTANT: This method must create a new ticker each time it is called.

        Specified by:
        createDefaultTicker in class Expressive
        Returns:
        a newly constructed default ticker.

      • prepareToPoll

        public Condition prepareToPoll(Condition condition)
        Description copied from class: Expressive
        Prepare the condition for polling. This implementation simply returns the condition unenhanced. Subclasses may wish to override this method to enhance the condition before polling. A typical use is to wrap the condition in a PublishingCondition.
        Overrides:
        prepareToPoll in class Expressive
